argument.description: A directory object that serves as an alias for the full path to where the file is located on the file server.
The name of the file on the file server.

returnType: The BFILENAME function returns a BFILE locator.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL BFILENAME function returns a BFILE locator for a physical LOB binary file.
sample:
CREATE DIRECTORY exampleDir AS '/example/totn'; SELECT BFILENAME('exampleDir', 'totn_logo.png')
FROM dual;
